Date Venue Time Sun, Jan 11, 2026 Vadodara, BCA Stadium, Kotambi 1:30 PM IST Wed, Jan 14, 2026 Rajkot, Niranjan Shah Stadium, Khandheri 1:30 PM IST Sun, Jan 18, 2026 Indore, Holkar Cricket Stadium 1:30 PM IST

India vs New Zealand - Full T20I Schedule

Date Venue Time Wed, Jan 21, 2026 Nagpur, Vidarbha Cricket Association Stadium 7:00 PM IST Fri, Jan 23, 2026 Raipur, Shaheed Veer Narayan Singh International Stadium 7:00 PM IST Sun, Jan 25, 2026 Guwahati, Barsapara Cricket Stadium 7:00 PM IST Wed, Jan 28, 2026 Visakhapatnam, ACA-VDCA Cricket Stadium 7:00 PM IST Sat, Jan 31, 2026 Thiruvananthapuram, Greenfield International Stadium 7:00 PM IST

NEW DELHI: India are set to host New Zealand for a high-profile eight-match limited-overs series beginning on January 11. The tour will feature three One-Day Internationals and five Twenty20 Internationals, with matches scheduled across multiple venues in the country through January 31.The series comes at a crucial juncture, with several senior players returning to the ODI format and the T20 side looking to fine-tune combinations ahead of the ICC T20 World Cup 2026, which gets underway on February 7 in India and Sri Lanka.The ODI leg of the series is expected to draw significant attention, particularly with stalwarts Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma making their anticipated return to the 50-over format after the South Africa series.Meanwhile, the T20Is will act as a final testing phase for Suryakumar Yadav-led Indian side as they prepare for their T20 World Cup title defence.While the BCCI has already announced the T20I squad for the New Zealand series, the ODI squad is yet to be named.The BCCI selection committee is likely to hold an online meeting around January 3 or 4 to finalise the ODI squad for the home series against New Zealand.New Zealand have already announced their T20I and ODI squads for India series.Michael Bracewell (C), Adi Ashok, Kristian Clarke, Josh Clarkson, Devon Conway, Zak Foulkes, Mitch Hay, Kyle Jamieson, Nick Kelly, Jayden Lennox, Daryl Mitchell, Henry Nicholls, Glenn Phillips, Michael Rae, Will Young: Suryakumar Yadav (C), Abhishek Sharma, Sanju Samson, Tilak Varma, Hardik Pandya, Shivam Dube, Axar Patel, Rinku Singh, Jasprit Bumrah, Harshit Rana, Arshdeep Singh, Kuldeep Yadav, Varun Chakaravarthy, Washington Sundar, Ishan Kishan: Mitchell Santner (C), Michael Bracewell, Mark Chapman, Devon Conway, Jacob Duffy, Zak Foulkes, Matt Henry, Kyle Jamieson, Bevon Jacobs, Daryl Mitchell, James Neesham, Glenn Phillips, Rachin Ravindra, Tim Robinson, Ish Sodhi
Article Summary: India set to host new zealand for a high-profile limited-overs series beginning on january 11. The tour will feature three one-day internationals and five twenty20 internationals, with matches scheduled across multiple venues in the country through january 31.

Article Title: 'Victory of the Hindus': After Shah Rukh Khan draws flak, BCCI asks KKR to release Bangladesh player; BJP hails move
Article Text:
BCCI Asks KKR To Release Bangladesh Player From IPL After Outrage Over Attacks On Hindu Minorities

NEW DELHI: Bharatiya Janata Party on Saturday welcomed BCCI's decision to instruct Shah Rukh Khan owned Kolkata Knight Riders to release Bangladesh player Mustafizur Rehman from their roster ahead of Indian Premier League.BJP leader Sangeet Som thanked BCCI for its decision and hailed it as a "victory of the Hindus of the entire nation.""Thanks to BCCI for its decision in view of the 100 crore Sanatanis of India," Som said."We said yesterday that cognisance will be taken of this matter because the sentiments of 100 crore people cannot be taken lightly. This is the victory of the Hindus of the entire nation," he added.Earlier in the day, BCCI secretary Devjit Saikia said that the decision was taken "due to the recent development going all across.""Due to the recent developments which is going on all across, BCCI has instructed the franchise KKR to release one of their player Mustafizur Rahman of Bangladesh from their squad and BCCI has also said that if they ask for any replacement, BCCI is going to allow that replacement," Saikia told news agency ANI.Recently, spiritual leaders had launched a broadside against KKR owner Shah Rukh Khan in context of the recent targeting of Hindu minorities in Bangladesh.Devkinandan Thakur criticised Shah Rukh Khan after KKR acquired right-arm pacer Mustafizur for a massive amount of Rs 9.20 crore during the IPL auction."In Bangladesh, Hindus are being brutally murdered, their homes are being burned, and their sisters and daughters are being raped. After witnessing such brutal killings, how can someone be so heartless, especially someone who calls himself the owner of a team? How can he be so cruel as to include a cricketer from that very country in his team?" he said.Meanwhile, Imam Umer Ahmed Ilyasi, the Chief Imam, All India Imam Organisation, also demanded that Shah Rukh Khan apologise to the nation for inclusion of the Bangladesh pacer in the KKR Squad.Imam Umer Ahmed Ilyasi said that KKR owner Shah Rukh Khan should give a statement condemning the atrocities being committed against Hindus in Bangladesh and also remove Mustafizur from his team."Does Shah Rukh Khan have no information regarding the atrocities being committed against Hindus in Bangladesh?... It is a matter of regret that despite having information regarding the atrocities being committed against Hindus in Bangladesh, KKR selected a Bangladeshi player in the IPL auction. Shah Rukh Khan should apologise to the nation...He should also give a statement condemning the atrocities being committed against Hindus in Bangladesh," Imam Umer Ahmed Ilyasi told ANI.Earlier, Shiv Sena leader Sanjay Nirupam had urged KKR owner Shah Rukh Khan to remove the Bangladeshi player from his team before the before he becomes a target."When the entire country is enraged and angry at Bangladesh, anyone in India who has even the slightest connection to Bangladeshis could become a target of that anger. If there is a Bangladeshi in Shah Rukh Khan's team, before he becomes a major target, we request that Shah Rukh Khan remove the Bangladeshi from his team. This will be for his own good and will also protect India's interests," Sanjay Nirupam told ANI.Reacting to the controversy, Congress leader Supriya Shrinate said the focus should be on who permitted Bangladeshi players to be included in the IPL auction in the first place."First of all, I want to ask who put the Bangladeshi players in that pool. This question is for the BCCI and the ICC. Home Minister's son, Jay Shah, should answer who put the Bangladeshi players in the pool where IPL players are bought and sold, the pool where the players' auction takes place... he is the ICC's chief and the main decision-maker in cricket all around the world," she said.This comes as Bangladesh saw a series of violent incidents targeting members if Hindu community.Last month, two Hindu youths were lynched in separate incidents. Dipu Chandra Das, a garment factory worker in Mymensingh district, was beaten to death over alleged blasphemy charges on December 18, after which his body was reportedly hanged and set on fire.In another case, a Hindu youth identified as Amrit Mondal was lynched in Hosendanga village of Kalimohor Union in Rajbari‚Äôs Pangsha sub-district over an alleged extortion dispute.These incidents have triggered widespread outrage and condemnation from political leaders, religious organisations and minority groups in both Bangladesh and India.
Article Summary: Bcci asks kkr to release bangladesh player from ipl after outrage over attacks on hindu minorities. Bjp leader sangeet som thanked bcci for its decision and hailed it as a "victory of the hindus of the entire nation" congress leader supriya shrinate said the focus should be on who permitted bangladeshi players to be included in the ipl auction in the first place.

Article Title: KKR drops Mustafizur Rahman: Politics erupts over Bangladesh player in IPL; opposition targets BCCI
Article Text:
Congress MP Shashi Tharoor, left, Mustafizur Rahman, middle, and BJP leader Sangeet Som

BCCI Asks KKR To Release Bangladesh Player From IPL After Outrage Over Attacks On Hindu Minorities

Also read |

Congress supports cricketer, questions BCCI

Also read |

BJP welcomes BCCI decision

Madan Lal backs Shah Rukh Khan

Mixed reactions continue

Also read |

NEW DELHI: Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) on Saturday released Bangladeshi fast bowler Mustafizur Rahman from their IPL 2026 squad following a directive from the Board of Control for Cricket in India ( BCCI ).KKR had picked Mustafizur Rahman for Rs 9.20 crore at the IPL auction held in December. However, his selection triggered a political backlash in India after reports emerged of recent mob violence and lynching incidents involving Hindu minorities in Bangladesh.Following the BCCI‚Äôs directive, Mustafizur Rahman will not be part of the IPL 2026 season, and the franchise has been permitted to name a replacement player in accordance with league rules.In a media advisory, KKR said, ‚ÄúKolkata Knight Riders confirms that BCCI/IPL as the regulator of IPL has instructed it to release Mustafizur Rahman from the squad ahead of the upcoming Indian Premier League (IPL) season.‚Äù The franchise added that the release was carried out after due process and consultations, and that the BCCI would allow a replacement player as per IPL regulations.The controversy drew reactions from political leaders, with Congress MP Shashi Tharoor coming forward in Mustafizur Rahman‚Äôs support, while the BJP strongly opposed his selection and targeted KKR co-owner Shah Rukh Khan , calling him a ‚Äútraitor.‚ÄùCongress MP Shashi Tharoor said sports should be separated from political tensions. ‚ÄúCricket should not be made to bear the burden for attacks on minorities in Bangladesh,‚Äù he told reporters, adding that Mustafizur Rahman had no role in the violence.‚ÄúMustafizur Rahman is a cricketer and has nothing to do with any of these things. He has not been personally accused of any hate speech or condoning or defending any attacks. Mixing these two things is simply not fair,‚Äù Tharoor said.He also cautioned against isolating neighbouring countries. ‚ÄúIf we become a country that isolates all of our neighbours, and say nobody is playing with any of them, how does it do any good? It is purely a sporting decision, and we should not let politics come into this,‚Äù he added.Congress leader and Karnataka Minister Priyank Kharge criticised the BJP for targeting the IPL franchise, saying overseas players participate in the league as per BCCI and IPL rules.In a post on X, Kharge said, ‚ÄúThe BJP and their 'Vichar Parivaar' are outraged over the inclusion of a Bangladeshi player in the IPL. If an overseas player is in IPL, it is because BCCI or the IPL rules allow him. Instead of blaming the franchise, shouldn't the BJP leaders ask why BCCI is allowing Bangladesh players to participate in IPL, when they should be banning it.‚ÄùHe further cited past instances to criticise BJP leaders. ‚ÄúThe same BJP leaders have no problem when: India played with Pakistan soon after the Pahalgam attack. IPL shifted matches to Islamic countries during COVID. IPL auctions are held in Islamic countries‚Ä¶ For BJP, 'nationalism' appears only when it suits their politics,‚Äù Kharge added.Congress MP Tariq Anwar defended KKR co-owner Shah Rukh Khan, calling it inappropriate to target the actor. He said foreign players can only be included after due permission from cricketing authorities and under international norms.Reacting to the controversy, Congress leader Supriya Shrinate said the focus should be on who permitted Bangladeshi players to be included in the IPL auction in the first place.Speaking to ANI, she said, "First of all, I want to ask who put the Bangladeshi players in that pool. This question is for the BCCI and the ICC. Home Minister's son, Jay Shah, should answer who put the Bangladeshi players in the pool where IPL players are bought and sold, the pool where the players' auction takes place... he is the ICC's chief and the main decision-maker in cricket all around the world."BJP leader Sangeet Som welcomed the BCCI‚Äôs decision and launched a sharp attack on Shah Rukh Khan, calling him a ‚Äútraitor.‚Äù He cited repeated violence against religious minorities in Bangladesh and claimed Mustafizur Rahman would not be allowed to play in the IPL.‚ÄúDespite all this, traitors like Shah Rukh Khan‚Ä¶ invest it in players from a country that is working against India,‚Äù Som told ANI, adding that the cricketer would not be able to play in the tournament.Uttar Pradesh Minister Narendra Kashyap also praised the BCCI‚Äôs move, saying it respected national sentiment. ‚ÄúWe welcome the decision of the BCCI that they understood the sentiments of the nation and removed the Bangladeshi player,‚Äù he said.Former India cricketer Madan Lal and World Cup winner supported Shah Rukh Khan, saying the actor had no role in team selection.‚ÄúThis is the decision of the BCCI and the Central government must have taken this decision, given the atrocities are being committed against Hindus in Bangladesh,‚Äù he told ANI.He added, ‚ÄúThere is no fault of Shah Rukh Khan as they have the team who picks the team.‚ÄùNational President of the All India Muslim Jamaat, Maulana Shahabuddin Razvi Barelvi, said there was no act of betrayal in Shah Rukh Khan selecting a Bangladeshi player.Meanwhile, Imam Umer Ahmed Ilyasi of the All India Imam Organisation said Shah Rukh Khan should apologise to the nation over the selection.Shiv Sena leader Sanjay Nirupam had urged Shah Rukh Khan to remove the Bangladeshi player, saying it would protect India‚Äôs interests and prevent the actor from becoming a target.Hindus in Bangladesh have been victims of mob violence and lynching in the aftermath of protests and the killing of student leader Osman Hadi. On December 18, 2025, Dipu Chandra Das was beaten to death by a mob over alleged blasphemy charges in Bangladesh‚Äôs Mymensingh district. In another incident, a Hindu youth, Amrit Mondal, was lynched in Rajbari district, triggering protests and strong reactions in India.
Article Summary: Kolkata knight riders (kkr) on saturday released bangladeshi fast bowler mustafizur rahman from their ipl 2026 squad. The decision follows a directive from the board of control for cricket in india ( bcci ).kkr had picked rahman for rs 9.20 crore at the ipl auction held in december.

Article Title: Max Scherzer and Erica May-Scherzer combined net worth in 2025: A closer look inside 'Mad Max' $180 million empire
Article Text:
Max Scherzer and Erica May-Scherzer (Image Source: Getty)

How Max Scherzer turned dominance into a million-dollar lifestyle

Erica May-Scherzer‚Äôs impact off the field





Max Martin Scherzer, the star baseball player, has made a career out of intensity, toughness, and an indomitable spirit to compete. The American professional Major League Baseball player is also known as ‚ÄòMad Max‚Äô, a pitcher who goes after hitters. That same determination is still noted in 2025, and this defines not only his presence on the pitch but also his financial position.As of 2025, Max Scherzer and his wife, Erica May-Scherzer, hold a combined net worth of approximately $180 million, making them one of the most financially secure couples in Major League Baseball.With an eight-time MLC All-Star title and three Cy Young Awards under his belt, Scherzer has consistently given elite performances into high value contracts. He started his career with the Arizona Diamondbacks and then topped it with the Detroit Tigers, Washington Nationals, and New York Mets.The right-handed player who is currently a free agent, mindfully entered contracts that were more focused on longevity and control. High average annual salaries, player opt-outs, and deferred payments allowed Scherzer to protect his future earnings. In 2025, he still gets money as a result of the past transactions which makes him stronger in terms of income even in the off-season.Such impactful decisions soared his career earnings to the highest point in the history of Major League Baseball.ID@undefinedCaption not available.Scherzer did not pursue the limelight beyond the baseball game. Rather, he collaborated and worked with selective equipment and performance-oriented brands. These endorsements contribute to his wealth, but at the same time, they maintain his game-oriented image in the eyes of the public. He also invested carefully, instead of gambling on high-profile projects, Scherzer was interested in stability and long-term growth. Such a disciplined manner is a reflection of how he prepares for every start.Max‚Äôs wife, Erica May-Scherzer, is a former softball player who has experience at the collegiate administrative level, giving her an understanding of professional sports. Owing to her professional player background, Erica has been a great contributor to the success of Scherzer in his career and has helped the couple on and off the field. Although public sources do not track her personal holdings, she is the core of the family philanthropy activities. Together, the Scherzers actively promote causes related to education, health, and social justice.The combined success of Max and Erica May-Scherzer is a result of consistency, crucial planning, and focused sustainability. Moreover, the couple is known to not engage in excessive endorsement but is rather mindful of them. This strategy has made their long career in baseball a permanent financial standard as well. Having a net worth of approximately $180 million, Scherzers can be viewed as a successful case study of how financial discipline, elite performance, and long-term thinking can build an empire that will endure long after the final pitch.Also Read: Austin Riley and Anna Morgan‚Äôs combined net worth in 2025: Career earnings, salary, family life and more
Article Summary: As of 2025, max scherzer and his wife, erica may-scherzer, hold a combined net worth of approximately $180 million. The couple is known to not engage in excessive endorsement but is rather mindful of them. Together, the scherzers actively promote causes related to education, health, and social justice.

Article Title: Jake Paul and Jutta Leerdam combined net worth in 2025: Inside their boxing earnings, Olympic career, love story, and business deals
Article Text:
Jake Paul and Jutta Leerdam combined net worth in 2025: Inside their boxing earnings, Olympic career, love story, and business deals (Image via Getty)

Jake Paul and Jutta Leerdam combined net worth in 2025

Jake Paul boxing earnings and business investments

Jutta Leerdam Olympic career and sponsorship income



Jake Paul and Jutta Leerdam relationship update





Jake Paul and Jutta Leerdam are one of the most talked-about sports couples right now. Fans follow their careers, their money, and their relationship closely. Together, they have built huge success in two very different sports. Jake earns from boxing and business deals. Jutta earns from Olympic-level speed skating and brand work. Their combined wealth keeps growing as both stay active in their careers.Jake Paul and Jutta Leerdam's combined net worth is estimated at roughly $205 million in 2025.Jake Paul's net worth is said at about $200 million. Most of his money comes from business ventures, pay-per-view sales, and boxing events. Jutta Leerdam's net worth is estimated at about $5 million gained from skating profits, prize money, and sponsorships.Jake Paul began boxing full-time in 2018. Since then, he has become one of the highest-earning names in crossover boxing.Jake Paul's fight with Mike Tyson in 2024 and his rematch with Anthony Joshua in 2025 earned millions in pay-per-view subscriptions and ticket sales. The fight against Mike Tyson sold out all of the seats in both Las Vegas and New York City, which produced a huge increase in revenues through the sales of pay-per-view and event tickets.In addition to being an accomplished fighter, Jake Paul runs Most Valuable Promotions, a boxing promotion company, and has also invested in several different gaming and sports investments.Jake Paul earns money from sponsorships, media endeavors, and investment properties. Boxing is only one source of income for Jake Paul.Jutta Leerdam is one of the top speed skaters in the world. She won Olympic silver at the 2022 Winter Olympics in skating sport and has multiple world titles in sprint events.Her income comes from race winnings, skating contracts, and brand deals. She has worked with major fashion and tech brands, along with social media partnerships. These deals make up a large part of her yearly earnings.Jake Paul and Jutta Leerdam made their relationship public in April 2023. Since then, they have been seen supporting each other at fights and skating events.Jake Paul had a noteworthy boxing match in 2025 with boxer Anthony Joshua, but her fiance Jutta Leerdam is still preparing for international ice skating events leading up to the following Olympic cycle.Early 2025 finds both of them prioritizing their careers. They often attend various major public events together.Also Read: Anthony Joshua Net Worth In 2025: Inside His Boxing Earnings, Career, And Payday Before Jake Paul Fight
Article Summary: Jake paul and jutta leerdam are one of the most talked-about sports couples. They have built huge success in two very different sports. Jake earns from boxing and business deals. Jutna earns from olympic-level speed skating and brand work. Their combined wealth keeps growing as both stay active in their careers.

Article Title: Natalya Neidhart and Tyson Kidd combined net worth: WWE careers, bonuses, salaries, contracts, and overall earnings
Article Text:
Natalya Neidhart and Tyson Kidd (Image Source: Getty)

Natalya Neidhart‚Äôs WWE career and earnings growth

Tyson Kidd‚Äôs in-ring success and post-injury WWE role





Natalya Neidhart and Tyson Kidd were born into professional wrestling and WWE universe and have been established since they were 20 years old. Through WWE contracts, television showcases, and decades of steady employment instead of fleeting headlines, both built financial futures. Good record of relevancy, including expanding their combined net worth.Neither is among WWE's top 10 global superstars so far as compensation, at least on the finer points of the evening, but the dollars tell the tale of consistent success for each. Natalya is still appearing regularly, while Tyson Kidd moved into an important backstage position after suffering a career-ending injury. Combined, their earnings have been accumulated with salaries, achievement bonuses, merchandise royalties, and offstage duties not associated with actual wrestling.Natalya Neidhart has had one of the longest, uninterrupted runs in WWE's modern era women's division. Having first debuted on the main roster in the late 2000s, she quickly became a consistent presence on weekly television, premium live events, and overseas excursions. This consistency eventually progressed into an uptick in contract renewals and a small bump in pay every year.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.The bulk of Natalya's income has traditionally come from a salary she is guaranteed to earn annually, bonuses related to major events, merchandise, and further exposure via WWE-related media. The association with the iconic Hart wrestling family only enhanced her brand value, allowing her to remain relevant throughout almost every era of women's wrestling. Her individual net worth has widely been estimated at around $2 million, a figure based on years of reliable earnings, not temporary highs.Tyson Kidd‚Äôs real-life identity is TJ Wilson. He started his career working as an in-ring performer, predominantly as a skilled singles male and tag team wrestler. However, a serious neck injury in 2015 saw his career take a drastic turn when he was forced to stop competing full-time.Instead of releasing him, WWE kept Kidd backstage in a producer and trainer role. It's a role that hardly anyone but hardcore fans will notice, but guarantees employment, stability, and permanence in a company. His continued role in planning matches and developing talent has helped him secure an ongoing source of income, which is reported at $3 million.Combined, Natalya Neidhart and husband Tyson Kidd have a net worth estimated at $5 million. That number represents two decades' worth of WWE contracts, bonuses, royalties, and near-constant employment. Their financial profile is linked to longevity, faith from management, and shifting roles within WWE, the opposite of top-tier superstars, most of whom work based on huge short-term contracts. Their overall wealth is expected to grow in the coming days.Also Read: What is really going on with WWE star Nikki Bella and NFL star Cooper DeJean‚Äôs dating buzz on Netflix?
Article Summary: Natalya neidhart and husband tyson kidd have a net worth estimated at $5 million. Their financial profile is linked to longevity, faith from management, and shifting roles within wwe. Their overall wealth is expected to grow in the coming days.

Article Title: Sidney Crosby‚Äôs lifestyle: Inside Pittsburgh Penguins captain‚Äôs luxury watch collection and personal style
Article Text:
Sidney Crosby of the Pittsburgh Penguins looks on against the Carolina Hurricanes (Credit: Getty Images)

Sidney Crosby of Pittsburgh Penguins luxury watch collection overview





The contribution of Sidney Crosby in the NHL cannot be overlooked. The 3 time Stanley Cup winner and two-time Olympic gold medalist has made history and won awards during his illustrious career. As fans cheer him up about his performance on the ice, off-ice activities display another side of the superstar; he is keen on details, style, and craftsmanship with his own luxury watches.The passion that Crosby shows towards watches is not just a hobby, but the love of design, functionality, and heritage. His well-managed time pieces, whether they are practical or a status symbol, are used during game days with the Pittsburgh Penguins or when he is being seen at a high-profile event. In the recent past, he had taken this interest further into business by investing in Swiss watchmaker Norqain, combining his interest in watches and business.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.His meticulous attention to detail is also pointed out in the watch line offered by Crosby.One of his most outstanding is the Wild ONE Skeleton 42mm Turquoise, which has been selected because of its lightweight and durable design, which best fits his active lifestyle. The skeletonized face and the bright turquoise highlights reflect the vigorous presence of Crosby on the ice. The other popular model is the Freedom 60 Chrono 43mm Black, which is sporty and yet has a chronograph feature and could be used at any casual or formal event.The Norqain watches were initially revealed to the Pittsburgh Penguins captain in 2019, at the NHL All-Star Game in San Jose, when he was given a timepiece as part of a set of All-Stars. It eventually gained him appreciation over the years to the extent that he decided to invest in the Swiss brand alongside his former teammate Mark Streit. This collaboration will enable Crosby to shape design and marketing with a wider audience, as well as spread his experience and enthusiasm to a wider audience.Crosby watches are not just a fashionable accessory, but they are a demonstration of his strict attitude to life and sport. From on-ice performance to entrepreneurial activities, every timepiece in his line reflects precision, strength, and sophistication. On the one hand, the collection of Crosby provides fans of both the NHL and horology a hint of the sophisticated preferences of one of the legendary figures in the history of hockey.Together, these watches underline Crosby‚Äôs enduring legacy, leadership, and refined taste beyond the hockey rink. His watch choices mirror discipline, longevity, and quiet excellence defining Crosby‚Äôs leadership beyond hockey culture.Ultimately, Sidney Crosby‚Äôs luxury watch collection symbolizes timeless excellence, reflecting the same consistency, focus, and class that define his NHL career. This refined interest mirrors Crosby‚Äôs disciplined mindset, blending precision with understated elegance away from competition.Also Read: Net worth of Auston Matthews in 2025: Details on Vegas Golden Knights captain's earnings, salary, and contracts
Article Summary: Sidney crosby is a three-time stanley cup winner and two-time olympic gold medalist. He has invested in swiss watchmaker norqain, combining his interest in watches and business. His watch choices mirror discipline, longevity, and quiet excellence defining his leadership beyond hockey.

Article Title: Caitlin Clark names her favorite NFL player on New Heights amidst Super Bowl buzz
Article Text:
Caitlin Clark (Image via Getty)

Caitlin Clark is a huge Drake Maye fan



Caitlin Clark‚Äôs most-awaited recovery and return







With the Super Bowl almost a month away, everyone has their favorites, and so does WNBA‚Äôs biggest star, Caitlin Clark. On the recent episode of the ‚ÄúNew Heights‚Äù podcast hosted by the Kelce brothers, Jason and Travis, the 2024 ROTY winner appeared and sparked a cross-sport debate after naming her favorites for Super Bowl 2026.Though Clark hails from Iowa, she admitted her admiration for the New England Patriots, which is largely influenced by her liking for Patriots star QB Drake Maye. This seemed like a classic case where greatness recognizes and appreciates greatness.The last episode of New Heights for 2025 was anything but not dramatic. In a conversation with Jason and Travis over who is Clark‚Äôs favorite to win the next Super Bowl, Caitlin revealed, ‚ÄúI may not be cheering for anybody‚Ä¶but honestly, I am a Drake Maye fan. He‚Äôs been incredible.Continuing, she said, ‚ÄúI will probably be pulling for the Patriots, but the Rams are really good too. Sam Darnold seems like a good guy‚Ä¶I could root for him.‚ÄùDrake Maye and Caitlin Clark began their professional career in 2024 and have been proving to be a cornerstone for their teams. Draye Maye registered a completion rate of 66.6% completing 225-of-338 passes in 2024, over 2,276 yards, and 15 touchdowns.Clark also entered the 2025 season after a historic rookie campaign where she averaged 19.2 points and a league-leading 8.4 assists per game. Though her 2025 season ended early, just after 13 games, due to an injury, the snippets from the USA camp show Clark is healthier and ready to enter the 2026 season with a bang.While the Super Bowl occupies the current headline from who‚Äôll play to who‚Äôll perform at halftime, the Indy fever fans are more concerned with Clark‚Äôs physical longevity. Reports suggest her 100% recovery and her focus on strength training to return by the WNBA‚Äôs 2026 tip-off. Clark‚Äôs return is just not crucial for the Fever, whose offensive strength revolves around her, but also for the league as she‚Äôs a walking viewership magnet.In 2025, as per ESPN, across all the 24 post-season games, WNBA delivered its best ever viewership ratings with an average of 1.2 million viewers. The four-most-watched WNBA games of 2025 all featured Caitlin Clark and her team. Now, that is some serious digital power flex.Also read: Caitlin Clark and Connor McCaffery's combined net worth 2025: Exploring WNBA power couple‚Äôs career earnin
Article Summary: Caitlin clark is a huge drake maye fan. The 2024 roty winner appeared and sparked a cross-sport debate after naming her favorites for super bowl 2026. Reports suggest her 100% recovery and her focus on strength training to return by the wnba‚Äôs 2026 tip-off.

Article Title: A‚Äôja Wilson vs Sophie Cunningham‚Äôs net worth in 2025: WNBA salary, contract details, brand endorsements, and more
Article Text:
A'ja Wilson and Sophie Cunningham. Image via: Getty Images

A‚Äôja Wilson‚Äôs net worth in 2025, WNBA salary, contract details, brand endorsements, and more

Article Title: New York Rangers Defeat Florida Panthers 5-1 in Winter Classic With Hat Trick by Mika Zibanejad
Article Text:
Brad Marchand and the Florida Panthers at Winter Classic (Via Getty Images)

New York Rangers finally got momentum behind them after winning against Florida Panthers

Rangers vs. Panthers | NHL Winter Classic Highlights | January 02, 2026

Also Read:





The New York Rangers couldn't have picked a better time to put together their most complete performance of the season. Mika Zibanejad led the way with a historic night in Friday's Winter Classic, recording five points, including the first hat trick in the event's history, as New York defeated the Florida Panthers 5-1.Zibanejad's five-point performance set an NHL record for outdoor games and sparked a Rangers team that desperately needed something to go right. New York entered the game losers of three straight and missing multiple key players to injury, but found a way to dominate the two-time defending Stanley Cup champions.The sellout crowd of 36,153 at loanDepot park witnessed the Rangers firing on all cylinders. Artemi Panarin added two goals and an assist for a three-point night that gives him seven points in NHL outdoor games, tied for the most all-time. Alexis Lafreniere contributed three assists, matching the outdoor game record.The Rangers talked about treating this game as a fresh start after a difficult stretch. Zibanejad explained that the team spent a couple of days with families and friends before refocusing for game time, and the approach clearly worked."We talked about it, about a fresh start here," Zibanejad said after the game. He expressed hope that the performance could be the beginning of something good for the struggling Rangers.Coach Mike Sullivan praised his team's effort across the board. The power play went 2-for-3 with Panarin scoring his first power-play goal of the season. The penalty kill was excellent at 5-for-6, shutting down Florida's dangerous attack at critical moments. Igor Shesterkin made 36 saves to keep the defending champions at bay.Sullivan noted that having top players show up on the scoresheet puts the team in a better position to win, but emphasized it was more than just offensive production. He thought the Rangers' best players were their very best on both sides of the puck.The challenge now becomes turning one excellent performance into sustained success. The Rangers improved to 20-18-5 but remain just 5-10-3 at home, where they've been shut out six times and outscored 57-34.New York gets its next chance Monday when they host Utah at Madison Square Garden. The team is still missing captain J.T. Miller, who sat out his sixth straight game with an upper-body injury, though he's skating with the team again and nearing a return.Zibanejad acknowledged the team needs to keep building on the foundation laid in Miami. The blocked shots, defensive sacrifice, and timely saves from Shesterkin provided a blueprint for success that needs to become the standard rather than the exception.
Article Summary: New york rangers defeated florida panthers 5-1 in the winter classic. Mika zibanejad recorded a hat trick and five points. Artemi panarin added two goals and an assist for a three-point night. Alexis lafreniere contributed three assists, matching the outdoor game record.

Article Title: LeBron James vs Stephen Curry net worth: Total earnings, salary, and more
Article Text:
LeBron James and Stephen Curry (Image via Getty)

LeBron James vs Stephen Curry salary breakdown

The net worth battle between LeBron James and Stephen Curry







LeBron James and Stephen Curry are the Mount Rushmore of modern NBA. They just do not dominate the court with their skills and game IQ, but make a significant impact off the court too. It is still wild to imagine how they both were born in the same hospital. Shocked much? As reported by the Beacon Journal in 2015, both James (1984) and Curry (1988) were born at Akron General Medical Center in Ohio, just a few years apart.These two heavyweights just don‚Äôt outshine their opponents on the court, but they also command the financial landscape of NBA. From battling for rings to sharing a bond of trust and respect, LeBron James and Stephen Curry have come a long way and so did their bank accounts. One is a certified billionaire business mogul, while the other is currently the highest-paid on-court performer the league has ever seen.If one just looks at the seasonal paycheck, then Stephen Curry is actually winning. For the 2025‚Äì26 season, Steph is pulling in a staggering $59.6 million from the Golden State Warriors, making him the highest-paid player in the league, a record that he has held since 2017-18. But LeBron James isn't exactly lagging, despite his Lakers salary for this season sitting at $52.6 million.The difference is Curry‚Äôs art of the "Supermax." He was the first player to cross the $200 million contract threshold when he signed a 5-year $201 million deal with the Warriors in 2017. And with his recent veteran extension of $62 million for 1-year, Curry‚Äôs on his way to becoming the first NBA player to be paid $62 million for a single season in 2026-27. However, while Steph wins the annual salary race, LeBron still leads in total career on-court earnings, having banked over $580 million since he was drafted back in 2003.This is where the comparison gets steep and the difference wide. LeBron James officially hit billionaire status in 2022 and currently sits at a net worth of approximately $1.3 billion. He didn't get there just by playing ball; he built an empire. Between his lifetime Nike deal (rumored to be worth over $1 billion), his production company SpringHill, and stakes in Fenway Sports Group (which owns the Red Sox and Liverpool FC), LeBron is playing a completely different game off the court.Stephen Curry‚Äôs current net worth is estimated at $240 million as of late 2025. While that‚Äôs a massive fortune, it shows the difference between being a superstar and being a tycoon. Steph‚Äôs wealth is climbing fast, though, thanks to his own Curry Brand, which is now independent after breaking with Under Armour and his Unanimous Media production house. At the end of the day, whether you prefer the King‚Äôs power or the Chef‚Äôs range, both are proving that the modern athlete is just as much a CEO as they are a point guard.Also read: "‚ÄúWe emptied the cups‚Äù: LeBron James and Bronny James get candid on LA Lakers‚Äô Spill The Tea
Article Summary: Lebron james and stephen curry are the mount rushmore of modern nba. They just do not dominate the court with their skills and game iq, but make a significant impact off the court too. One is a certified billionaire business mogul, while the other is currently the highest-paid on-court performer the league has ever seen.

when the Philadelphia 76ers face the New York Knicks on January 3, 2026, at Madison Square Garden. The Knicks are dealing with several question marks, including Karl-Anthony Towns (illness), Josh Hart (ankle), and Mitchell Robinson (knee).Also read: Philadelphia 76ers vs New York Knicks regular season game: Full injury report, who's out, where to watch, and more (January 3, 2026) If New York‚Äôs frontcourt remains thin, Philadelphia could lean heavily on Embiid inside while Tyrese Maxey applies pressure on the perimeter. With Embiid likely available, the Sixers hold a clear advantage in the paint, setting up a meaningful test at Madison Square Garden.

when the Denver Nuggets face the Cleveland Cavaliers on January 2, 2026. Instead, it arrives with Denver missing much of its regular rotation and focused on getting through the night without further issues. The Nuggets are deep into an Eastern Conference road trip and are clearly thinking beyond a single January game.The Denver Nuggets confirmed earlier in the day that Nikola Jokic will not suit up in Cleveland. Article Title: Russell Westbrook becomes NBA‚Äôs highest-scoring point guard in Kings' 4th straight loss
Article Text:
Russell Westbrook (Ed Szczepanski-Imagn Images)

Russell Westbrook surpasses Oscar Robertson



Russell Westbrook‚Äôs longevity







On January 2, 2026, Russell Westbrook didn‚Äôt just break a record but got himself a place at the table with the NBA legends. With a driving layup at the 4:23 mark of the fourth quarter against the Phoenix Suns, Westbrook notched his 26,711th career point.In that single motion, "The Brodie" officially surpassed the legendary Oscar Robertson to become the highest-scoring point guard in the history of the NBA. Moving into 15th place on the league‚Äôs all-time scoring list, Westbrook has reached a rare feat that only a few ever dreamed of in their 18th season.With an 8-26 record, the Kings travelled to PHX Arena to lock horns against the current 7th-best team in the West, Phoenix Suns. Though this road game gave fresh wounds to Kings after they faced their 4th straight loss, 102-129, Russell Westbrook reached an individual milestone.Coming into the game, Westbrook trailed Robertson by 16 points. He finished the night with 17 points, bringing his career total to 26,711 points, along with 8 rebounds, and 6 assists while going 6-12 from the field. This milestone is particularly sweet because it cements him as the highest-scoring true point guard to ever play the game.Kings‚Äô head coach, Doug Christie, when asked about Westbrook reaching this milestone, praisingly said, "I didn‚Äôt know he broke another record tonight. (smiles) He continues to break records. Russ is a freak of nature‚Ä¶ always been a fan of his. It‚Äôs an absolute honor to coach him.‚ÄùFor decades, Robertson‚Äôs triple-double records were thought to be untouchable until Westbrook made averaging a triple-double look easy. Along with Oscar Robertson, he has now outscored icons like Dominique Wilkins, Tim Duncan, and Paul Pierce. The next targets on the list are Hakeem Olajuwon (26,946) and Elvin Hayes (27,313).What makes this achievement so remarkable is the time it required to reach the top 15. Now in his 18th season, Russell Westbrook is no longer the primary scoring option, often comes off the bench as a sixth man, but continues to find ways to be productive, be it through his game IQ or veteran experience. This season, Westbrook is shooting a career-high 36% from deep and 42.7% from the field with an average of 14.5 points, 6.7 rebounds, and 7.0 assists.After a turbulent season with Lakers where he failed to meet the expectations, team consistency has been an issue for Westbrook. From 2020-25, he has changed 5 teams and ultimately settled with the Kings in 2025. This was a crucial record, especially since too many questions were raised regarding his performance.For their next meet-up, the Sacramento Kings will be hosting the Milwaukee Bucks at Golden 1 Center this weekend.Also read: NBA‚Äôs Highest-Paid Centers This Season: Nikola Jokiƒá, Anthony Davis & More
Article Summary: Russell westbrook surpassed oscar robertson to become the highest-scoring point guard in the history of the nba. With a driving layup at the 4:23 mark of the fourth quarter against the phoenix suns, westbrook notched his 26,711th career point. He finished the night with 17 points, along with 8 rebounds, and 6 assists.

Article Title: ‚ÄúStill the Magic Man‚Äù: Fans celebrate as NBA legend Magic Johnson makes grand appearance at Rose Parade
Article Text:
NBA legend Magic Johnson (Image via: Getty Images)

Magic Johnson brings star power to Rose Parade celebrating legacy beyond basketball

Fans in awe as Magic Johnson takes center stage at the Rose Parade

Fans react in admiration as Magic Johnson leads the Rose Parade celebrations (Image via: Instagram)





The Rose Parade, officially known as the Tournament of Roses Parade, is one of America‚Äôs most celebrated New Year‚Äôs traditions. Held on the New Year's Day in Pasadena, California, every year, the parade includes beautifully decorated floats made with flowers, parade bands, etc. It began in 1890 as a way to show off Pasadena‚Äôs pleasant weather during the winters and has now grown into a celebration watched by hundreds of thousands in person and by millions on television. The parade takes place early in the morning along Colorado Boulevard and is followed later in the day by the famous Rose Bowl college football game. Volunteers known as ‚ÄúWhite Suiters‚Äù spend hours each year to help prepare the floats and manage the crowd.In 2026, the parade‚Äôs theme was ‚ÄúThe Magic in Teamwork‚Äù, celebrating unity. The Grand Marshal is a position that leads the parade and takes part in the Rose Bowl coin toss. This new year, that is, in 2026, it was NBA legend Magic Johnson. Johnson‚Äôs selection as the Marshal goes not only to his legendary basketball career but also his lifelong commitment to teamwork and community work.Magic Johnson‚Äôs commitment as the Grand Marshal of the 137th Rose Parade brought even greater excitement to the much-celebrated moment. Johnson, widely regarded as one of the greatest basketball players of all time, enjoyed a brief career with the Los Angeles Lakers as their guard, winning NBA championships and NBA MVP honors. He also won a gold medal in the 1992 U.S.Olympic with the ‚ÄúDream Team‚Äù, alongside NBA legends such as Michael Jordan, Larry Bird, Charles Barkley, Scottie Pippen, and others.Johnson‚Äôs life has been centered around teamwork, which sits perfectly with the parade‚Äôs theme in 2026. Beyond the NBA, Johnson has achieved success in business and philanthropy, including community service, alongside his wife, Cookie Johnson, who has been a pillar of strength and motivation ever since they have been together. This major impact has made his role as the Grand Marshal especially very meaningful, celebrating both his personal success and his contributions to society.As the Grand Marshal, Magic Johnson rode down Colorado Boulevard as the head of the parade, waving to the crowds. For many fans, watching a sports icon like him take up this role was something even beyond inspirational, especially for the younger generations who may know him more from the legacy he's created off the court. The presence of legendary figures like Johnson is a true reflection of the idea that the forum, as big as the NBA, could be extended beyond sports by engaging in teamwork and community services, which can create some very unforgettable moments for the fans to cherish for a lifetime and beyond. As for the Rose Parade, it continues to be a symbol of unity and celebration.Fans have positively reacted to this gesture by the NBA legend Magic Johnson, taking up the role of the Grand Marshal. ‚ÄúHardest workin man in LA, see you in Maui or Monarc beach soon!‚Äù, one fan commented. ‚ÄúThank you Mr. Johnson‚Äù, another one wrote. While a third user added, ‚ÄúThe Best Magic‚Äù. ‚ÄúYou are so rad. You are still the magic man‚Äù, another user commented on the post. ‚ÄúNothing but love for Magic Irwin Johnson.‚Äù, a fifth user added. ‚ÄúThe goat‚Äù, a fan wrote. These comments show the deep respect and admiration people hold for Johnson, not just as a former NBA legend, but also as an inspirational figure, working towards society and making a positive impact on the people. These suggest that Johnson remains a beloved man among his fans, years after his retirement.Also Read: Magic Johnson vs Michael Jordan net worth comparison: Exploring NBA veterans' career earnings, off-court ventures and more
Article Summary: Nba legend magic johnson is the grand marshal of the rose parade in 2026. The parade is held on new year's day in pasadena, california, every year. The grand marshal is a position that leads the parade and takes part in the rose bowl coin toss.

Article Title: Philadelphia 76ers vs New York Knicks regular season game: Full injury report, who's out, where to watch, and more (January 3, 2026)
Article Text:
Philadelphia 76ers Joel Embiid vs New York Knicks (Image via Getty).

Philadelphia 76ers vs New York Knicks Injury report (January 3, 2025)

Philadelphia 76ers vs New York Knicks When and where to watch (January 3, 2026)

How both teams are playing

Matchups to watch in tonight's 76ers vs Knicks game

Philadelphia 76ers vs New York Knicks Betting outlook (January 3, 2026)





The Philadelphia 76ers visit the New York Knicks on January 3, 2026, for an Atlantic Division game at Madison Square Garden. Both teams come in dealing with injuries, and those absences could decide how this game plays out.New York has been strong at home, while Philadelphia has held its own on the road. With key players listed as out or questionable on both sides, this game is likely to lean heavily on the stars who are available, especially in the fourth quarter.Philadelphia 76ers will be without Kelly Oubre Jr., who is sidelined with a left knee sprain. Trendon Watford is also out due to a left adductor strain. The biggest question is Joel Embiid, who is listed as probable because of right knee injury management. If he plays, the Sixers gain a clear advantage inside. If not, their frontcourt becomes much thinner.The New York Knicks are also missing important pieces. Josh Hart remains out with an ankle injury and has already missed several games. Mitchell Robinson is listed as probable as he continues to manage his own ankle issue. Landry Shamet is unavailable with a shoulder problem, while Karl-Anthony Towns could return after missing time due to illness.Tip-off is set for 7:30 p.m. ET. The game will air on NBA TV nationally, with local broadcasts on NBC Sports Philadelphia and MSG Network. Streaming options include NBA League Pass, the ESPN app, and Fubo.New York enters the night at 23-11 and has been one of the league‚Äôs best home teams, going 15-3 at Madison Square Garden. Even with recent injuries, the Knicks have stayed competitive by controlling the glass and limiting second chances.Philadelphia is 18-14 overall and 9-6 on the road. Tyrese Maxey has carried the offense, averaging 30.9 points per game, especially when Embiid‚Äôs minutes are managed. The Sixers have had success with strong second quarters, but injuries have made it harder to sustain that level across a full game.The guard matchup between Maxey and Jalen Brunson will set the tone. Both control the pace and take most of the late-game shots. If Embiid plays, his minutes against the Knicks‚Äô bigs will matter just as much. Bench production is another concern, as both teams are missing rotation players.New York is favored by 3.5 points at home. The total sits around 232.5 points. The Knicks are listed between -162 and -166 on the moneyline, with Philadelphia between +136 and +138. Projections lean toward a narrow Knicks win, with recent trends pointing toward another high-scoring game.
Article Summary: The philadelphia 76ers visit the new york knicks on january 3, 2026. The game will air on nba tv nationally, with local broadcasts on nbc sports philadelphia and msg network. Tip-off is set for 7:30 p.m. Et. New york is favored by 3.5 points at home.
